summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2988 for the improvement of Warren Avenue and Warren Place, from First Avenue to Roy Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; under Ordinance No. 35954, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
